trends: There have been no other sightings in East Greenbush
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details1st - driving west on route 151 approaching Elliot Rd. at the horizon moving south to north was a very bright, too fast to be a plane, light. Approximately 500 to 1000 ft up. Looked to be close enough to be crossing Luther rd itself, but may've been a trick of perspective and was actually farther away. If that is the case then the object obviously had to be moving even faster than it appeared. One witness. 2nd - Approximately between midnight and 1 a.m. Behind Quigley's restaurant in East Greenbush NY on routes 9 and 20 (after only having one beer). Again, object moving South to North directly overhead. Meteor or comet style of movement without a tail. Very bright, white and green with a "burning" type of look to it as if it was something that burned green as it entered the atmosphere. (Copper? Magnesium?) Arcing type of movement--it WAS however moving away from us--it was a very large ball. As it neared the end of it's path it gave the impression of turning, then disappeared. I'd venture an altitude of less than 2000 ft. with a duration of 2-4 seconds. Two witnesses, we were talking behind the bar when I caught the movement out of the corner of my eye as the object came into view above the roof of the building. I turned quickly to follow it's path, exclaiming "What the hell is that?!" Other witness stood there, mouth agape, reacted once it disappeared. I Know the Bootid meteor shower was scheduled for two days later, but green is a color I was not accustomed to seeing. that and the altitude of these events seemed incongruous to a shower.
